mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.agent_id AS "agentId", a.agent_code AS "agentCode", a.agent_name AS "agentName", b.agent_level AS "agentLevel", b.agent_type AS "agentType", b.agent_expiry AS "agentExpiry", a.short_name AS "shortName", a.head_name AS "headName", a.head_phone AS "headPhone", a.head_idcard AS "headIdcard", a.head_idcard_expiry AS "headIdcardExpiry", a.email AS "email", a.legal_name AS "legalName", a.legal_phone AS "legalPhone", a.legal_idcard AS "legalIdcard", a.legal_idcard_expiry AS "legalIdcardExpiry", a.busi_type AS "busiType", a.busi_code AS "busiCode", a.busi_expiry AS "busiExpiry", a.reg_amount AS "regAmount", a.org_inst_code AS "orgInstCode", a.tax_reg_code AS "taxRegCode", a.addr_province_code AS "addrProvinceCode", a.addr_province_name AS "addrProvinceName", a.addr_city_code AS "addrCityCode", a.addr_city_name AS "addrCityName", b.addr_country_code AS "addrCountryCode", b.addr_country_name AS "addrCountryName", a.addr_detail AS "addrDetail", a.agent_area_addr AS "agentAreaAddr", a.deposit_amount AS "depositAmount", a.join_amount AS "joinAmount", a.idcard_face_image AS "idcardFaceImage", a.idcard_back_image AS "idcardBackImage", a.agreement_file AS "agreementFile", a.busi_image AS "busiImage", a.tax_reg_image AS "taxRegImage", a.org_inst_image AS "orgInstImage", a.other_gena_image AS "otherGenaImage", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.agent_user_id AS "agentUserId", a.agent_change_status AS "agentChangeStatus", a.agent_change_type AS "agentChangeType"
left join agent_info b on b.id = a.agent_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM agent_info_change a
AND a.agent_code like '%'||#{agentCode}||'%' '%'+#{agentCode}+'%' concat('%',#{agentCode},'%')
AND a.agent_name like '%'||#{agentName}||'%' '%'+#{agentName}+'%' concat('%',#{agentName},'%')
AND a.head_name like '%'||#{headName}||'%' '%'+#{headName}+'%' concat('%',#{headName},'%')
AND a.head_phone like '%'||#{headPhone}||'%' '%'+#{headPhone}+'%' concat('%',#{headPhone},'%')
AND a.legal_name like '%'||#{legalName}||'%' '%'+#{legalName}+'%' concat('%',#{legalName},'%')
AND a.legal_phone like '%'||#{legalPhone}||'%' '%'+#{legalPhone}+'%' concat('%',#{legalPhone},'%')
AND a.create_time BETWEEN #{beginCreateTime} AND #{endCreateTime}
AND a.agent_change_status = 'SYSCHK'
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.id desc

SELECT
FROM agent_info_change a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agent_info_change( id, agent_id, agent_code, agent_name, short_name, head_name, head_phone, head_idcard, head_idcard_expiry, email, legal_name, legal_phone, legal_idcard, legal_idcard_expiry, busi_type, busi_code, busi_expiry, reg_amount, org_inst_code, tax_reg_code, addr_province_code, addr_province_name, addr_city_code, addr_city_name, addr_detail, agent_area_addr, deposit_amount, join_amount, idcard_face_image, idcard_back_image, agreement_file, busi_image, tax_reg_image, org_inst_image, other_gena_image, create_time, update_time, agent_user_id, agent_change_status, agent_change_type ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{agentId}, #{agentCode}, #{agentName}, #{shortName}, #{headName}, #{headPhone}, #{headIdcard}, #{headIdcardExpiry}, #{email}, #{legalName}, #{legalPhone}, #{legalIdcard}, #{legalIdcardExpiry}, #{busiType}, #{busiCode}, #{busiExpiry}, #{regAmount}, #{orgInstCode}, #{taxRegCode}, #{addrProvinceCode}, #{addrProvinceName}, #{addrCityCode}, #{addrCityName}, #{addrDetail}, #{agentAreaAddr}, #{depositAmount}, #{joinAmount}, #{idcardFaceImage}, #{idcardBackImage}, #{agreementFile}, #{busiImage}, #{taxRegImage}, #{orgInstImage}, #{otherGenaImage}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{agentUserId}, #{agentChangeStatus}, #{agentChangeType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE agent_info_change SET agent_id = #{agentId}, agent_code = #{agentCode}, agent_name = #{agentName}, short_name = #{shortName}, head_name = #{headName}, head_phone = #{headPhone}, head_idcard = #{headIdcard}, head_idcard_expiry = #{headIdcardExpiry}, email = #{email}, legal_name = #{legalName}, legal_phone = #{legalPhone}, legal_idcard = #{legalIdcard}, legal_idcard_expiry = #{legalIdcardExpiry}, busi_type = #{busiType}, busi_code = #{busiCode}, busi_expiry = #{busiExpiry}, reg_amount = #{regAmount}, org_inst_code = #{orgInstCode}, tax_reg_code = #{taxRegCode}, addr_province_code = #{addrProvinceCode}, addr_province_name = #{addrProvinceName}, addr_city_code = #{addrCityCode}, addr_city_name = #{addrCityName}, addr_detail = #{addrDetail}, agent_area_addr = #{agentAreaAddr}, deposit_amount = #{depositAmount}, join_amount = #{joinAmount}, idcard_face_image = #{idcardFaceImage}, idcard_back_image = #{idcardBackImage}, agreement_file = #{agreementFile}, busi_image = #{busiImage}, tax_reg_image = #{taxRegImage}, org_inst_image = #{orgInstImage}, other_gena_image = #{otherGenaImage}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, agent_user_id = #{agentUserId}, agent_change_status = #{agentChangeStatus}, agent_change_type = #{agentChangeType} WHERE id = #{id}
